mapper.select: SELECT f.ISBN13 AS isbn13, COUNT(*) AS reviewCnt, ROUND(AVG(rd.RATE), 1) AS ratingAvg FROM FEEDS f JOIN REVIEW_DETAIL rd ON rd.FEED_ID = f.FEED_ID WHERE f.FEED_CATEGORY = 'REVIEW' AND f.IS_DELETED = 'N' AND f.IS_BLIND = 'N' AND f.ISBN13 = #{isbn13} GROUP BY f.ISBN13
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FEEDS f JOIN REVIEW_DETAIL rd ON rd.FEED_ID = f.FEED_ID WHERE f.FEED_CATEGORY = 'REVIEW' AND f.IS_DELETED = 'N' AND f.IS_BLIND = 'N' AND f.ISBN13 = #{isbn13}

SELECT f.FEED_ID AS feedId, f.ISBN13 AS isbn13, f.USER_ID AS userId, u.PROFILE_NM AS profileNm, u.PROFILE_IMG AS profileImg, u.USE_IMG AS useImg, rd.RATE AS rate, f.FEED_TITLE AS title, f.CONTENT AS content, f.CREATED_AT AS createdAt FROM FEEDS f JOIN REVIEW_DETAIL rd ON rd.FEED_ID = f.FEED_ID JOIN USERS u ON u.USER_ID = f.USER_ID WHERE f.FEED_CATEGORY = 'REVIEW' AND f.IS_DELETED = 'N' AND f.IS_BLIND = 'N' AND f.ISBN13 = #{isbn13} ORDER BY f.CREATED_AT DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}
SELECT FEED_ID FROM FEEDS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND ISBN13 = #{isbn13} AND FEED_CATEGORY = 'REVIEW' AND IS_DELETED = 'N' AND IS_BLIND = 'N' LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FEEDS ( FEED_ID, USER_ID, ISBN13, FEED_CATEGORY, FEED_TITLE, CONTENT, FEED_STATUS, IS_BLIND, IS_DELETED, CREATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{feedId}, #{userId}, #{isbn13}, 'REVIEW', #{title}, #{content}, 0, 'N', 'N', NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE FEEDS SET FEED_TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, UPDATED_AT = NOW() WHERE FEED_ID = #{feedId} AND USER_ID = #{userId} AND FEED_CATEGORY = 'REVIEW' AND IS_DELETED = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT f.FEED_ID AS feedId, f.ISBN13 AS isbn13, f.USER_ID AS userId, rd.RATE AS rate, f.FEED_TITLE AS title, f.CONTENT AS content, u.PROFILE_NM AS profileNm, u.PROFILE_IMG AS profileImg, u.USE_IMG AS useImg, f.CREATED_AT AS createdAt, CASE WHEN f.USER_ID = #{userId} THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS mineYn FROM FEEDS f JOIN REVIEW_DETAIL rd ON rd.FEED_ID = f.FEED_ID JOIN USERS u ON u.USER_ID = f.USER_ID WHERE f.FEED_CATEGORY='REVIEW' AND f.IS_DELETED='N' AND f.IS_BLIND='N' AND f.ISBN13 = #{isbn13} ORDER BY f.CREATED_AT DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}
SELECT f.ISBN13 FROM FEEDS f WHERE f.FEED_ID = #{feedId} AND f.FEED_CATEGORY = 'REVIEW' LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE FEEDS SET IS_DELETED = 'Y', UPDATED_AT = NOW() WHERE FEED_ID = #{feedId} AND USER_ID = #{userId} AND FEED_CATEGORY = 'REVIEW' AND IS_DELETED = 'N'
